title: Five-Star Halliday Winery Escape
description: Discover the beauty of Victoriaâ€™s Pyrenees Wine Region during your stay at Summerfield Winery Accommodation. Located in Moonambel, this winery has been run by the Summerfield family for generations. Summerfield Winery has been recognised for producing some of the best red wines in Australia and rated a 5 Star Red Winery by James Halliday. Includes wine tasting, complimentary bottle of Summerfield's finest wine, complimentary cheese platter, in-room breakfast pack and late checkout in this self-contained accommodation in a stunning winery location.

title: Five-Star Halliday Winery Escape
description: Head for the hills for a country escape like no other: stay at the Summerfield Winery (a five-star James Halliday rated winery), in the heart of Victoria's Pyrenees wine region. Stay in a Studio Apartment and enjoy a complimentary breakfast pack with all the goods (bacon, eggs, tomatoes and more), a bottle of Summerfield Winery's finest wine, a delicious cheese platter, daily wine tasting and a leisurely late 11 am check out.
